body.name: Powerizer Complete Laundry Powder Detergent & Multipurpose Cleaner | 6.5 lb Detergent Powder | 294 Scoops | Plant-Based Concentrated Laundry Soap & Dishwasher Detergent Powder
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 10 hrs 28 mins
features: CLEAN EVERYTHING IN YOUR HOME with Powerizer powder detergent. One product does it all. This powder acts as a laundry powder to remove unwanted stains leaving your clothes fresh, soft, and bright. This detergent powder also works wonders as a powder dish soap leaving your dishes clean and free from residue.

SAVE MONEY with this powerful multipurpose cleaning powder detergent. This powder cleaner is not just a laundry powder and dish detergent, use it to clean everything in your home - kitchen, bathroom, walls, appliances, carpet and upholstery, and even your car interior. If it needs cleaning, it needs Powerizer.

FRESH, CLEAN SCENT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN - Our detergent powder has a natural clean scent. Powerizer powder cleaner is made with Safer Choice synthetic fragrance rather than essential oils. This sensitive skin laundry detergent formula prevents residue that may irritate those who have sensitive skin.

SAFE FOR YOU AND THE ENVIRONMENT - Earth-friendly, biodegradable, bio-based safe organic laundry powder detergent and dishwasher detergent. Does not contain water, fillers, dyes, or phosphates. Powerizer Complete detergent powder is a USDA Certified Biobased Product.

THE CLEAN COMPANY - Powerizer cleaning products are environmentally friendly and made from natural plant-based ingredients that are safe for humans and the environment. Their mission is to simplify your life with quality cleaning products that deliver what they promise.
5-IN-1 Laundry Detergent | Color Safe Bleach | Color Booster | Fabric Softener | Stain Remover | Machine Cleaner
3-IN-1 Dishwasher Detergent | Rinse Aid | Machine Cleaner

10-IN-1 MULTI PURPOSE CLEANER - Bathroom Cleaner | Carpet/Upholstery Cleaner | Floor Cleaner | Glass Cleaner | Appliance Cleaner | Hard Surface Cleaner | Stainless Steel | Toilet Bowl Cleaner | Laundry | Dishwasher

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerizer Complete Powder Concentrate The Clean Company aims to simplify your life with quality products that do everything it promises. Powerizer Complete offers a cleaning solution to address all your cleaning needs with a single multipurpose cleaner.
Beautifully Cleans Your Laundry with One Scoop Effectively remove toughest stains on clothes, powers out oil and sweat, and eliminate odor.

All-In-One Dishwasher Detergent Cleans So Well You Don’t Need Multiple Dishwashing Products Forget the hassle of buying dishwashing detergent, rinse aid and machine cleaner. Formulated with all three components to give you sparkling clean residue-free dishes and a spotless machine.

One Scoop Replaces All Laundry and Dishwashing Products No need to use stain removers, bleaches, color boosters, or softeners. Say goodbye to water softener and rinse aid packets. One scoop of Powerizer Complete powder concentrate works wonders and cleans both machines. Cleans Everything Dirty in Your Home Clean your kitchen, toilet, and all other imaginable surfaces with this versatile, convenient cleaning concentrate. Save on Time, Money, and Space No more switching between different detergents. No need to fill your cabinets with various cleaning supplies.
Before and After photos Vest Carpet Pans

Safe For Your Family, Your Machine, and the Environment Powerizer Complete Powder Concentrate is formulated with mineral and plant-based ingredients. Doesn’t contain water, fillers, dyes, or phosphates. Made cruelty free and pet friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried tons, literally dozens, of all natural laundry detergents. Never have been totally happy. I tried this on a whim, hnestly not expecting much. I was so wrong! It got stubborn smells out of my husband's shirts (armpit odor), got our cloth diapers clean and odor free, and tomato sauce almost completely out in one wash with no pretreatment. It also completely removed a mud and other various unknown food stains in one wash no pretreatment. Then I tried it in the dishwasher. Dishwasher funk was gone, and it got my plastic compost bin clean and fresh which is almost impossible to do. So then I started cleaning all kinds of stuff. Soaked our sinks, which were "clean", and the water turned brown. Ewe. I also soaked the kids' tub toys, and got my stainless sink sparkly again. Our basement shower is next on my list. Best of all, it smells nice while you're cleaning with it, but leaves no scent when it's done and rinsed. Great for sensitive skin like our family, and also sensitive noses. My daughter recently had a meltdown after I washed her blanket in baby detergent that smelled like powder. I re washed with Powerizer and she said it was "fresh" again. I just ordered a case of this stuff. My new go to! Oh, one negative- I did find it left our clothes a smidge coarse, so I add in a tablespoon of Zote soap flakes to our wash.UPDATE: it also cleaned the basement shower really well, which is painted concrete with a plastic patio floor. All of got fresh and clean. Very happy! I will continue to use this product and hope it doesn't get discontinued

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty amazing stuff
reviews.reviewText: I don't give five stars for much, but this stuff is amazing. Everything I've used it on so far is cleaner than it was with any other products. I have hard water and all the problems that go along with that. In order to get my whites bright I had to create a concoction with different laundry products to make that happen and I would only get so-so results, but I use two scoops in my giant washing machine and my whites are blinding. I actually did soak some things that were badly stained and was stunned when the stains were gone. Have used it to dissolve hard water deposits in my tub and use it as my dishwasher detergent. Only half a scoop for that, the dishes look great, in the inside of the dishwasher is nice and clean.I'm still finding uses for it, but so far it's well worth it for the few things I do use it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This detergent is fabulous I’d
reviews.reviewText: I am not familiar with this product so I thought I would give it a try all of thereviews I read about it about how great detergent it is, clothes, smell wonderful after using very clean and fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars pleasantly surprised, so far so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked well in the dishwasher
reviews.reviewText: This does not smell good, so be aware of that. It worked really well in my dishwasher but not so much in the laundry. My son works at a restaurant and is constantly coming home with the smell of oil and chicken on his clothes. I had to re wash his work clothes with my go to Gain to get the smell/stains out. This is very expensive for the money so I probably wouldn't buy it again. I have not tried it for any other uses around the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cleaner and I’m impressed.
reviews.reviewText: I always leave honest reviews which may or may not upset the sellers. But this product really works. I’ve been using it for laundry and I do Airbnb. I had a guest who left blood on towels and linens. I was going to toss them out but instead i decided to try cleaning with this stuff. The stains came out.I’ve been using it for laundry more often now and I’m about to start using it as a spray cleaner as well. I tend to use mrs Meyers as well as a lemon oil cleaner and windex for various things. Let’s see how this stacks up on all purpose cleaning. I’m also going to start spraying my toilets with this before using the toss away pod things that attach to the stick. If they work I’ll use one pod per 2 toilets just as a wipe down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Useful - Laundry, dishwasher, general cleanup...
reviews.reviewText: We have a front loader and stains had built up on the rubber gaskets using conventional laundry detergent. Our first load of Powerizer scrubbed these off but did leave a bit of residue on a washcloth. I would recommend that if you have the scum build up - run a preliminary load to remove potential stains. After that one time, it cleans perfectly. For dishwasher we notice that with Finish or other detergents there seems to be a slight haze to the stainless steel hub. Powerizer leaves the dishes very clean and shines up the washer significantly. We also use in our carpet cleaner - making sure the mixture is thoroughly dissolved before pouring into the cleaning fluid container. We also use the liquid concentrate for spotting on the carpet and it works well. In general we are very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grocery store cleaners don't come close!
reviews.reviewText: Dish washer - With half of the tiny included cup, dishes literally sparkle when washed. There's no more funky dishwasher smell.Laundry - Follow the directions. Clothes come out smelling like ... nothing. No perfumes, no chemicals, just clean. There's no static cling when they leave the dryer, so no fabric softener is needed. I usually press the the autosoak button for very soiled items.Carpet - I follow the directions, using very hot tap water, to make a gallon and fill a spray bottle. Don't screw the lid on the bottle or the expanding "power" can do harm to the mechanism. Saturate stains, let them set. Next, I use the shampooer, with either clear water or carpet cleaner. Make sure the stained areas are rinsed very well. If you have any leftover solution, pour it in the toilet, bathtub, or shower, and let it soak.Stained Flower Vase - Sprinkle a few granules in the bottom and fill with hot water. Wait for a few minutes and watch the magic.Hard floors - I don't use it for this because by the time I've finished mopping, I'm too tired to rinse. I'm sure the floor would look great if I did!
